system.description:
All sealers hold similar tenets, regardless of any master they serve.

  • Stand Watch. Remain vigilant for powerful supernatural threats at all times.
  • Bar the Gate. If it is possible to prevent the arrival of a powerful, destructive entity, then that should be your goal.
  • Know the True Threat. Do not allow the malignant idea that anything unfamiliar is dangerous to infect your mind. Judge others on their actions, not their appearance or lineage.
  • Return the Fugitive. If something that should not roam free escapes its confinement, it is your responsibility to return it to its prison.
  • Seal Away. Guard the prisons of dangerous entities with dedication and care.
